benchmark_details.name: HELLO BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: HelloBench is a comprehensive, in-the-wild, and open-ended benchmark to evaluate Long Language Models' (LLMs) performance in generating long text. It categorizes long text generation tasks into five subtasks: open-ended QA, summarization, chat, text completion, and heuristic text generation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the long text generation capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) in a comprehensive manner.

data.source: Manually collected and filtered data from internet sources and public datasets.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation based on adherence to checklist criteria for generated responses.
methodology.interpretation: Evaluation scores indicate the quality of long text generated by LLMs relative to human standards.
methodology.validation: Benchmark validated through human annotation and comparison against existing metrics.

harm: Generating content that may contain discrimination in various aspects such as politics, gender, and race.
